hydrologistmod:AbstractAdaptiveCard.NAME: ABSTRAAAAACT
hydrologistmod:AbstractAdaptiveCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The below text appears as dynamic effect display for Adaptive cards

hydrologistmod:AbstractHydrologistCard.NAME: ABSTRAAAAACT
hydrologistmod:AbstractHydrologistCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: note for translators: these keywords need to be localized to properly for dynamic tooltip features to work
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: the following words appear in card type boxes

hydrologistmod:AblativeShell.NAME: Ablative Shell
hydrologistmod:AblativeShell.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:AmalgamateWaters.NAME: Amalgamate Waters
hydrologistmod:AmalgamateWaters.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Copy the hydrologistmod:Mutable effects of any card discarded this way onto this card.

hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.NAME: Aqueducts
hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an extra card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
hydrologistmod:Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an *Ice card, gain !M! Block.

hydrologistmod:BracedForm.NAME: Braced Form
hydrologistmod:BracedForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! copies of *Razor *Ice into your hand.

hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.NAME: Branching Creeks
hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, choose between !M! additional cards.

hydrologistmod:Cascade.NAME: Cascade
hydrologistmod:Cascade.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded this way.

hydrologistmod:Cryogenics.NAME: Cryogenics
hydrologistmod:Cryogenics.DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of cards in your hand to hydrologistmod:Transmute. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:Cryogenics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then choose any number of cards in your hand to hydrologistmod:Transmute. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:CrystalIce.NAME: Crystal Ice
hydrologistmod:CrystalIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the effect of the hydrologistmod:Paired *Laminar *Flow by that much. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:CrystalLattice.NAME: Crystal Lattice
hydrologistmod:CrystalLattice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card in your hand. Add !M! additional copies of the new card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:CrystalSpear.NAME: Crystal Spear
hydrologistmod:CrystalSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals extra damage equal to the total hydrologistmod:Purity of ALL your cards.

hydrologistmod:Debilitate.NAME: Debilitate
hydrologistmod:Debilitate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Thermal_Shock to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
hydrologistmod:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply hydrologistmod:Cold, apply !M! additional hydrologistmod:Cold. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Defrost.NAME: Defrost
hydrologistmod:Defrost.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain all hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards in your hand.
hydrologistmod:Defrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain all hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards in your hand.

hydrologistmod:Dehydrate.NAME: Dehydrate
hydrologistmod:Dehydrate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is not hydrologistmod:Cool, apply !M! hydrologistmod:Heat.

hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.NAME: Dimensional Icicles
hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand for the rest of combat.
hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

hydrologistmod:Drench.NAME: Drench
hydrologistmod:Drench.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is not hydrologistmod:Hot, apply !M! hydrologistmod:Cold.

hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.NAME: Encapsulating Ice
hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.DESCRIPTION: Your *Pressure *Blasts this combat are played with X increased by X. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your *Pressure *Blasts this combat are played with X increased by X+1. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Endothermancy.NAME: Endothermancy
hydrologistmod:Endothermancy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, apply !M! hydrologistmod:Cold to ALL enemies. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
hydrologistmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL hydrologistmod:Swaps when played. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Exothermancy.NAME: Exothermancy
hydrologistmod:Exothermancy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, apply !M! hydrologistmod:Heat to ALL enemies. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:FallingIcicles.NAME: Falling Icicles
hydrologistmod:FallingIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.NAME: Flowing Currents
hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, you cannot swap away from this card again this turn. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then hydrologistmod:Flow. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, you cannot swap away from this card again this turn. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card can't be swapped again this turn!

hydrologistmod:FreezeDry.NAME: Freeze Dry
hydrologistmod:FreezeDry.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! copies of *Razor *Ice to your hand.

hydrologistmod:FrostWhip.NAME: Frost Whip
hydrologistmod:FrostWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Cold. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL Costs [E] to hydrologistmod:Swap.

hydrologistmod:FrigidLash.NAME: Frigid Lash
hydrologistmod:FrigidLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the Block gained by the hydrologistmod:Paired card by !M! this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:FrozenCapsule.NAME: Frozen Capsule
hydrologistmod:FrozenCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute this card. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, this gains !M! hydrologistmod:Purity.

hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card this turn, deal !D! damage again.

hydrologistmod:GlacialStrike.NAME: Glacial Strike
hydrologistmod:GlacialStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is hydrologistmod:Hot, gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is hydrologistmod:Cool, deal an additional !D! damage.

hydrologistmod:GlacialSynthesis.NAME: Glacial Synthesis
hydrologistmod:GlacialSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into an *Ice card.

hydrologistmod:GlacierBash.NAME: Glacier Bash
hydrologistmod:GlacierBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, reduce this card's cost by [E] for this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Hail.NAME: Hail
hydrologistmod:Hail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL *Ice cards by !M! this combat.

hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.NAME: Heat and Pressure
hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's hydrologistmod:Heat amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's hydrologistmod:Heat amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HeatBlast.NAME: Heat Blast
hydrologistmod:HeatBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently gain damage equal to the enemy's hydrologistmod:Heat amount. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:HighPressure.NAME: High Pressure
hydrologistmod:HighPressure.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply hydrologistmod:Heat, apply !M! additional hydrologistmod:Heat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable

hydrologistmod:HighTide.NAME: High Tide
hydrologistmod:HighTide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Flow. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HotSprings.NAME: Hot Springs
hydrologistmod:HotSprings.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies suffering from hydrologistmod:Thermal_Shock.

hydrologistmod:Hydraulics.NAME: Hydraulics
hydrologistmod:Hydraulics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, hydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:IcyFloe.NAME: Icy Floe
hydrologistmod:IcyFloe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Flow, draw a card. NL Increase your maximum hand size by !M!.

hydrologistmod:JetPropulsion.NAME: Jet Propulsion
hydrologistmod:JetPropulsion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Heat. If the enemy does NOT intend to attack, draw 2 cards.

hydrologistmod:LaminarFlow.NAME: Laminar Flow
hydrologistmod:LaminarFlow.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:LayeredShell.NAME: Layered Shell
hydrologistmod:LayeredShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the damage dealt by the hydrologistmod:Paired card by !M! this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:MeltingIceberg.NAME: Melting Iceberg
hydrologistmod:MeltingIceberg.DESCRIPTION: This gains !M! hydrologistmod:Purity. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: hydrologistmod:Transmute this card.

hydrologistmod:PersonalRaincloud.NAME: Personal Raincloud
hydrologistmod:PersonalRaincloud.DESCRIPTION: Create a *Raincloud and hydrologistmod:Pair it with a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:PersonalRaincloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand, then create an Upgraded *Raincloud and hydrologistmod:Pair it with it. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Pneumatics.NAME: Pneumatics
hydrologistmod:Pneumatics.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL At the start of the next turn, hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:Pneumatics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL At the start of the next !M! turns, hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:PressureBlast.NAME: Pressure Blast
hydrologistmod:PressureBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X (+ !M! ) times. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:PressureBuildup.NAME: Pressure Buildup
hydrologistmod:PressureBuildup.DESCRIPTION: Every 5th hydrologistmod:Corporeal card you play, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:PressureCycle.NAME: Pressure Cycle
hydrologistmod:PressureCycle.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile, then shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.
hydrologistmod:PressureCycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.

hydrologistmod:PureIce.NAME: Pure Ice
hydrologistmod:PureIce.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: Draw a card. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: Gain !B! Block.

hydrologistmod:PureSteam.NAME: Pure Steam
hydrologistmod:PureSteam.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: Draw a card. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: Deal !D! damage.

hydrologistmod:PureWater.NAME: Pure Water
hydrologistmod:PureWater.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: Draw a card.
hydrologistmod:PureWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: Draw a card. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: hydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:Purify.NAME: Purify
hydrologistmod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play all of your hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards from left to right targeting this enemy. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Raincloud.NAME: Raincloud
hydrologistmod:Raincloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:Raincloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:RazorIce.NAME: Razor Ice
hydrologistmod:RazorIce.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. hydrologistmod:Ebbing. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: Gain !B! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Mutable: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve
hydrologistmod:ReleaseValve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Flow, the enemy takes !M! damage for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Reservoir.NAME: Reservoir
hydrologistmod:Reservoir.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, discard this card. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:ResonantCrystal.NAME: Resonant Crystal
hydrologistmod:ResonantCrystal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, the new card is Upgraded.

hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.NAME: Ripcurrent
hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's hydrologistmod:Cold amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's hydrologistmod:Cold amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.NAME: River Of Time
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next hydrologistmod:Swappable card is also played *Swapped.
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 hydrologistmod:Swappable cards are also played *Swapped.

hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.NAME: Scalding Geyser
hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Heat. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:SeaFoam.NAME: Sea Foam
hydrologistmod:SeaFoam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card in your hand. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:SearingSynthesis.NAME: Searing Synthesis
hydrologistmod:SearingSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into a *Steam card.

hydrologistmod:Siphon.NAME: Siphon
hydrologistmod:Siphon.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Copy its hydrologistmod:Mutable effects onto this card's hydrologistmod:Pair, then hydrologistmod:Transmute it. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Slurry.NAME: Slurry
hydrologistmod:Slurry.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to triple its hydrologistmod:Heat or hydrologistmod:Cold. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:Slurry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to triple its hydrologistmod:Heat or hydrologistmod:Cold.

hydrologistmod:SoggySynthesis.NAME: Soggy Synthesis
hydrologistmod:SoggySynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into a *Water card.

hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.NAME: Soothing Water
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, permanently increase this card's healing by 4 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, permanently increase this card's healing by 6 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:StagnantCloak.NAME: Stagnant Cloak
hydrologistmod:StagnantCloak.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose HP, lose !M! less. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:SteadyTide.NAME: Steady Tide
hydrologistmod:SteadyTide.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Next turn, draw an additional extra card for each card discarded this way.

hydrologistmod:SteamEngine.NAME: Steam Engine
hydrologistmod:SteamEngine.DESCRIPTION: The first hydrologistmod:Corporeal card you play each turn is played twice.

hydrologistmod:SteamLash.NAME: Steam Lash
hydrologistmod:SteamLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Heat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, gain [E].

hydrologistmod:SteamPower.NAME: Steam Power
hydrologistmod:SteamPower.DESCRIPTION: If enemy is suffering from hydrologistmod:Thermal_Shock, draw cards equal to its duration and remove it. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:SteamPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If enemy is suffering from hydrologistmod:Thermal_Shock, draw cards equal to its duration and remove it.

hydrologistmod:StormOfSleet.NAME: Storm of Sleet
hydrologistmod:StormOfSleet.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. Add a *Razor *Ice into your hand for each card discarded.

hydrologistmod:SwelteringStrike.NAME: Sweltering Strike
hydrologistmod:SwelteringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy is hydrologistmod:Hot, deal !D! damage. NL If enemy is hydrologistmod:Cool, deal !D! damage.

hydrologistmod:TidalWave.NAME: Tidal Wave
hydrologistmod:TidalWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Upstream.NAME: Upstream
hydrologistmod:Upstream.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hydrologistmod:Cold. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

hydrologistmod:ViscousShell.NAME: Viscous Shell
hydrologistmod:ViscousShell.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: Gain !B! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute this card.
hydrologistmod:ViscousShell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Mutable: Gain !B! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute this card.

hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.NAME: Wall of Ice
hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:WaterWheel.NAME: Water Wheel
hydrologistmod:WaterWheel.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Transmute a card. NL It gains !M! times X hydrologistmod:Purity. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:YawningAbyss.NAME: Yawning Abyss
hydrologistmod:YawningAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage an additional time for each stack of hydrologistmod:Cold on the enemy.
